医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 分析肺部超声图像以发现 COVID-19新的研究表明，人工智能可以在肺部超声图像中发现 COVID-19，就像面部识别软件可以在人群中识别面孔一样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/AI-analyzes-lung-ultrasound-images-to-spot-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/AI-analyzes-lung-ultrasound-images-to-spot-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e89d31b-aa85-4c29-8ce1-a5f3c1d0dbe4 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:47:35 -0400 AI analyzes lung ultrasound images to spot COVID-19
中年：大脑健康和认知的关键转折点《评论》强调中年对于认知轨迹和大脑健康的重要性，提倡建立捕捉非线性变化的研究模型，以更好地理解这一时期发生的独特过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Middle-age-A-ritic-turning-point-for-brain-health-and-cognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Middle-age-A-ritic-turning-point-for-brain-health-and-cognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1377ce3-ffce-457a-bd8c-2e8167079c6f Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:45:00 -0400 Middle age: A critical turning point for brain health and cognition
研究性基因疗法显示出治疗罕见儿童神经退行性疾病的希望一种针对一种从儿童早期开始的罕见神经退行性疾病（称为巨轴突神经病（GAN））的研究性基因疗法具有良好的耐受性，并且在美国国立卫生研究院领导的一项临床试验中显示出治疗效果的迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Investigational-gene-therapy-shows-promise-for-rare-childhood-neurodogenic-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Investigational-gene-therapy-shows-promise-for-rare-childhood-neurodogenic-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37a2a630-3c53-4c24-8ae6-f4d6bf795dba Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:38:00 -0400 Investigational gene therapy shows promise for rare childhood neurodegenerative disease
特别药品定价计划提高前列腺癌治疗依从性密歇根大学罗格尔癌症中心和癌症研究所的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，在参与特殊药品定价计划的医院接受治疗的前列腺癌患者比其他医院的患者更有可能坚持处方药治疗。医疗保健政策和创新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Special-drug-pricing-program-boosts-prostate-cancer-treatment-adherence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Special-drug-pricing-program-boosts-prostate-cancer-treatment-adherence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3830ebf3-626c-4062-b40e-325db62ea4df Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:29:00 -0400 Special drug-pricing program boosts prostate cancer treatment adherence
建立社区意识是改善人们心理健康的关键昆士兰大学的研究发现，建立社区意识是改善人们心理健康的关键，特别是在社会经济水平较低的郊区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Building-a-sense-of-community-key-to-improving-peoples-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Building-a-sense-of-community-key-to-improving-peoples-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fed9b7f-0c68-4640-8d61-879d9ab21789 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:21:00 -0400 Building a sense of community key to improving people's mental health
二手电子烟烟雾与儿童更多哮喘症状有关《儿童》杂志上的研究探讨了二手电子烟烟雾对哮喘儿童的影响，表明尽管临床干预需求没有显着差异，但症状天数有所增加，强调了认识电子烟烟雾潜在危害的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Second-hand-vape-smoke-linked-to-more-asthma-symptoms-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Second-hand-vape-smoke-linked-to-more-asthma-symptoms-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec11faa5-8432-44f0-b97a-41ab38fa5349 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:18:00 -0400 Second-hand vape smoke linked to more asthma symptoms in kids
频繁的肌肉骨骼疼痛与提前退休风险增加有关朴茨茅斯大学的一项新研究表明，频繁的肌肉骨骼疼痛与提前辞职和退休的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Frequent-musculoskeletal-pain-linked-with-increased-risk-of-early-retirement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Frequent-musculoskeletal-pain-linked-with-increased-risk-of-early-retirement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dfb1161-ce44-40de-bc19-52342d0537b1 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:13:39 -0400
提高乳腺癌和卵巢癌治疗的安全性和有效性一些抗癌治疗不仅针对肿瘤细胞，还针对健康细胞。如果它们对后者的影响太强，它们的使用就会受到限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Enhancing-the-safety-and-efficacy-of-breast-and-ovarian-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Enhancing-the-safety-and-efficacy-of-breast-and-ovarian-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abab02f0-b826-41b3-b579-77aa1de74851 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 23:01:48 -0400 Enhancing the safety and efficacy of breast and ovarian cancer treatment
气候变化加剧了全球真菌威胁《柳叶刀微生物》的评论讨论了全球气温上升如何使真菌适应，变得更加耐热并扩展到新的领域，这可能导致新型病原体的出现增加，对社会弱势群体的影响最大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Climate-change-heats-up-fungal-threats-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Climate-change-heats-up-fungal-threats-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8307edfd-07e9-4bf4-837f-9f5286175187 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 22:56:00 -0400 Climate change heats up fungal threats worldwide
治疗与改善心脏病结果相关的焦虑和抑郁根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》（美国心脏协会的开放获取、同行评审期刊）上的新研究，治疗焦虑和抑郁可以减少心脏病患者的急诊室就诊和再住院次数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Treatment-for-anxiety-and-depression-linked-with-improved-heart-disease-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Treatment-for-anxiety-and-depression-linked-with-improved-heart-disease-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a29130a3-cc23-43c0-8819-cfe26771618a Wed, 20 Mar 2024 22:38:43 -0400 Treatment for anxiety and depression associated with improved heart disease outcomes
